author: Mrs Gabeva
text:
Just when you start thinking that VC has improved their customer service and you get hit by another ridiculousness from their side. On august 25th i sold a chanel item. Shipped in in august 26th and they received it on august 27th. Shortly I received an email saying thay in order to proove the authenticity of the item i have to send them a copy of the invoice. The funny thing is that I actually bought that item on VC so it has already been authenticated once by them ?!?! Now they are questioning their own professionalism... anyway, I immediately sent an email with all the information- order no, date of purchase, date of declaration of conform, etc and said that actually the invoice i have is from them. Received an authomatic answer that my email is being processed and wil get a reply in 48 hours. Guess what? 48 years passed, no reply but instead i am getting a reminder to send the requested information. So i am left with no choice but to contact customer service via the app which is always a bummer. I do so, explain and they say - ignore the reminder if you have sent the information. I am asking whether they received my email - they say yes. Good thing that i have horrible experience and this taught me never to take they answers seriously but to keep asking - so i am asking - what does my email say? Of course i receive the answer - we have not received it .... so ok i have to resend again. Unfortunately i do not even get shocked by their consistent ridiculousness and lack of professionalism. But it is still
Frustrating because they are wasting my time, they keep the buyer waiting, the do not even check their emails and are actually doing nothing but questioning their own authentication... and it is a dead end because nobody actually cares to do their job. It is a constant rollacoaster with them. Few transaction go fine and then some crazy thing happens when you least expect it and the worst part - for obviously no realistic reason. Just frustrating and unacceptable.
title: Frustrating and ridiculous

author: Tanya
text:
I don’t think Vestiaire cares about sellers.

I sold a balenciaga bag in perfect condition for a great price. I then got an email stating that although my bag was in perfect condition it was marked non compliant because there was no invoice. However the bag was not advertised with an invoice. So I am shocked that my bag was made non compliant given this is the only reason an otherwise perfect bag has been refused. 

Furthermore, Vestiaire could have easily contacted me to verify the invoice issue rather than offer the buyer the chance to cancel the sale. If I had been contacted I could have explained why there was no invoice and perhaps offered to email a copy for the buyer. 

This is a terrible reason for refusing my sale and I am extremely disappointed with the service. Furthermore, no one updated me to tell me that the buyer had refused the item. I had to contact Vestiaire for this update. When I complained they agreed that the bag should not have been refused as it was sold as advertised. I can only assume that Vestiaire did not want to sell my item.

This is not the first problem I have had selling with Vestiaire. They cancelled another sale because the bag had python leather (without making clear I can’t sell python online) and then returned it to the wrong address! When I finally got it back it was squashed into a small box with poor packaging and the handles were squashed. 

Customer service is slow and  terrible - You have to use their chat function and you cannot have a conversation with a real person. There is no record trail as you can’t email. They do this to protect themselves against their poor service. Make sure you take screen shots of your chats or you will have no evidence of their poor and contradictory service. 

Personally, I have had so many issues selling with Vestiaire I cannot trust them to sell on my behalf anymore. Plus they charge a fortune in commission for a terrible service. I do not recommend at all.
title: TERRIBLE SERVICE FOR SELLERS

author: Vik
text:
I placed an order for a Givency bag 3 weeks ago. The bag is a counterfeit. It can be easily appreciated by anyone who knows how Givenchy bags look in the inside. The inside zipper is plastic and the condition of the bag (leather, label etc.) does not satisfy the brand standards. This bag passed the first authentication control and a second authentication control despite being a counterfeit.
Either their team of experts does not exist or have no knowledge that enables them to distinguish between fake and original items.
This is very serious since VC is claiming an item is original when it is not. I cannot resell this item since it would be illegal so there is nothing else I can do as the brand does not provide authentication services.  
Now, nobody within VC is helping me nor replying to my emails. But because of VC autehtication team's incompetence I have lost 400EUR.
I STRONGLY DISCOURAGE ANYONE FROM SHOPPING OR SELLING AT VC... the company "guarantees" the authenticity of items but this is not true. This only encourages more fake items to be sold on the website. I wonder how many people have bought items thinking they were original when they are not!!!
title: VESTIAIRE CLAIMS FAKE ITEM AS AUTHENTIC

author: Iris
text:
I was a very loyal customer from VS for years and recently there's two very unpleasant events I really want to share it to other users. 

First 
I've bought a Hermes belt at July, I paid and I was waiting and waiting for the update. I asked VC few times about the progress as the seller use other delivery than DHL. And after 23 days waiting for it I saw there's a new post selling exactly the same belt. So I msg VS saying that's very strange and I hope the seller is not re posting my belt. They replied me like it won't happen as the belt will arrive their warehouse. 
After a day, they told me they've made a mistake and the item was sold to the new buyer. 
I do not understand what is the logic behind this. I paid and I was waiting and asking the situation of my belt. And now they told me it was sold?
Why don't them tell the new buyer that they made a mistake and cannot sell to her I stead?

So I have no choice but got refunded. 
They didn't even gave me a apology until I send an email to them saying I'm very disappointed. 
They gave me a EUO15 coupon. Which is not even enough for the shipping as a compensation. 


Secondly
Therefore I was waiting and I found another good deal for another hermes belt on their website. 
I bought it immediately. 
Payment was made. I got the SMS and bank notification Immediately. 
However I was waited for few hours there was no order number no email saying my order has been made. 
So I used the live chat to ask VC what was wrong and at the end ofcourse. They refund me. 

Even I wrote email told them I bought it immediately when it was out and they didn't even care. It was the technical problem of the app and I lost another good deal. 

I checked my bank another day and they refunded me the incorrect amount. 
They still own me EUO83!

So I emailed them and online chat with them for many times and I showed the proof of my bank and everything. 
They kept saying I should contact my bank. 
Alright. I contacted my bank and asked for every transactions between this company. 
They told me there's no charges or exchange fees. My bank suspect that they were trying to refund my previous order with them (a pair of shoes which has the exact amount of what they refunded me.)

So I email and told them what happened. And ask them to find out and give me back the differences. 

They kept saying at their system they never receive my money and refunded me back. 

Okay I have two questiones: 

Why my bank shows that I only got refunded partly from what I've paid?

And why is that the amount you refunded to me is the exact amount of my previous order?
I'm sure this is their mistake. 

I've got refunded from the first hermes belt and everything was okay. The amount was exactly the same with no problem.  

83 EUO is not a lot but it's completely ridiculous for what I never get! 
I never get the belt and I did not deserve to pay for it. 


This is ridiculous and unacceptable 
I lost my trust completely to this company
title: Very bad experience

author: Amanda
text:
I thought I was on a professional website, for serious sellers and buyers. What a joke
I have items for sale on VC. 
A buyer made an offer for one of my items- I accepted. No payment was made. I was under the assumption that once an offer is accepted, it is binding. 
On other sites, such customers are blacklisted; for sellers to be aware. Not on VC. 
These non serious buyers are allowed to get away with not paying, when an offer is accepted time and time again, 
I have contacted VC’s customer service by email to complain, but no reply.
 VC are very very unprofessional. They are a bunch of scammers and so are their buyers. You need to change your processes, and blacklist non paying buyers, so that sellers are made aware and can reject future bids from these scammers/time wasters.
VC are quick to charge huge commission, but offer terrible customer service.
title: The worst ever!!!

text:
VC has extremely poorly-designed IT system and their customer service is also a joke. So please AVIOD AT ALL COST, because if anything goes wrong, it will become a NIGHTMARE dealing with VC.

I recently purchased a pair of shoes via VC. When the item arrived at VC for quality control, there were defects which were not mentioned in the original listing. 

VC tried to contact me but their system had a bug. So without my consent, they were ready to ship the item.

Then I had to contact Customer Service via the Chat function on their app (I guess they've probably decided to close call centres to avoid cost - but what kind of company does that??)

Finally, the Customer Service team got in touch via email. However, when I tried to respond to them, their email address doesn't work! I keep receiving mail delivery failure notifications!

This is ridiculous - they are making it impossible to be contacted! I have no idea what is the status of my item - all I want is to cancel the order given the defect but they are making it impossible!
title: Impossible to be contacted! Worst customer service

text: Their customer service is quite honestly the worst I have ever dealt with. They seem very kind and helpfull at the time, but they do not act on ANYTHING they say. I have spoken to half a dozen agents the past week, all say they will resolve my issue, but nothing is being done. I sold a backpack, and instead of paying me the correct amount, which was 130 euro, I have been payed 75. They keep reassuring me that they will fix it, but they don't. This is plain steeling. Their app has many issues, and instead of owning up to it, they put the blame on users... I sold a relisted item, and the printable shipping label was of the old item. They tried to blame me for printing the wrong label. Then the money issue. Plus if you don't screenshot the chat, you have no proof of your discussion. title: If I could give less than one star I…

author: Yulia
text:
The only reason I am writing here (although I have a lot of interesting stories about my sales on VC) is because I made a big sale on VC and now I am stuck with my item because DHL refuses to take it from me due to its high value.
I have contacted both DHL and VC obviously and apparently it can be shipped (after all my conversations with DHL) but if VC provides proper documentation on their end and contacts their account manager which is not my responsibility. Obviously, I can't call anyone in VC and so called "chat support" is completely useless, feedback form takes 3 days to get back to you with useless answer. The only update I've got is that logistics department is looking for alternative arrangements. Hello? Have you tried to liaise with DHL first???
However, they do not forget to send me reminders "you have only 5 days to ship your item". How great. Absolutely no way to get in touch with anyone who can at least do something reasonable. 
So, if there is anyone reasonable from VC who is reading it and can assist with the matter, please do it ASAP.
Update: my item is being shipped now to the customer but response to this review was made only after I already went through enormous hassle and got all the updates.
I would not change the rating though, firstly, because you really never ever ever can get in touch with anyone senior. The only communication you are dignified with is with very junior people in support, some of them are nice and some of them can be even rude. I am okay with cheaper items but for really valuable items (mine was about 20,000 dollars - for the record) and premium commission I am expecting smoothest possible communication which is not there.
Secondly, communication again. Expected authentication time is within 6 days which did not happen. Why not dignify your clients with an update that it will take longer time? Instead, I am having stupid responses like "oh we are swamped blah blah blah". Really? I sold another item after my super valuable one (also jewellery but cheaper), passed authentication same day it was received.
I will write special separate review about overall experience on VC as a seller and honestly people - you have to do something to treat your clients with more respect. Now as sellers we are again being stripped off completely with being punished for cancelling sales - while buyers can make offers and not pay while others can't buy the item. Enough said - will go to another review.
title: Never can get proper customer support
